sentence: The PolThe pool was a beautiful tranquil oasis and a lovely temperature despite lacking anything mind blowing in terms of design or style
The pool on the roof was great during the day and service outstanding by the pool barman
We took advantage of the serene atmosphere of the hotel and the pool and sauna facilities where we were pampered
Shops restaurants spa and pool
The roof top swimming pool offered an oasis on calm when we were exhausted from all the exploring
Friendly and inspirational beautiful pool and amenities
I like the pool gym small
Gorgeous pool area with iced water beautifully chilled face towels
The hotel room and pool were beautiful
Pool barman helpful
Then I stretched out by the pool which is wonderful and although you can hear the refurbishment works it is not vastly different to the sounds of the city it did not bother me
The world famous Singapore Sling is currently being served in the pool and billiards bar
Raffles was originally on the beach front and guests could saunter down for a swim and return
No shorts open toes shoes or sandals pool attire is not permitted

When you are arriving for a 1 night special occasion and have a nice plan of how you will spend your afternoon and evening being made to wait in the courtyard and effectively lose the afternoon by the pool made it a stressful and very disappointing start
The Spa previously located near the pool is now situated downstairs in the Raffles Arcade
The pool was a little odd
Pool bar service under served

In terms of design the one major flaw is the disappointing gym fitness area which is clearly a last minute thought unsatisfactory as it is both split up into three sections and effectively on the way to from the pool as well as not being very well equipped for a hotel of this standard
On arrival we were offered complimentary breakfast and later a drink in the pool bar as our room was n’t ready
The gym is modern and does it job but the pool is spectaular

i fell dangerously in the poldespite the pool having a sign saying we should be careful i entered the pool keeping the raildespite this i fell it was slippery and no friction on the tilesi injured my foot badly needing treatment on arrival back in Cape Towni am glad the patrons were prevented from entering the pool from the stairs after my fall
The pool was closed we were taken across the road which was fine
